title: Companion Approval Guide
content: nk of mime drinking with Thisobald Thorm Succeed a Performance check, or Persuasion check if you're a Warlock, with a DC of 16 Astarion +Halsin +Karlach +Lae'zel + Minthara + N/A Thisobald Thorm The Waning Moon in the Reithwin Masons' Guild - after surviving a drink or pretending to drink with Thisobald Thorm, he'll ask you to regale him with your past.
